H0.text: At which film festival could you be awarded the 'Palm d'Or'. Berlin International Film Festival

H1.text: At which film festival could you be awarded the 'Palm d'Or'. Sundance Film Festival

H2.text: At which film festival could you be awarded the 'Palm d'Or'. Toronto International Film Festival

H3.text: At which film festival could you be awarded the 'Palm d'Or'. Cannes

A4.text: The Palme d'Or is the highest prize awarded to the director of the Best Feature Film of the Official Competition at the Cannes Film Festival.

A5.text: The Palme d'Or was reintroduced in 1975 and has since remained the festival's symbol, awarded each year to the director of the winning film.
